# 94. Deprecating rabbitmq_migration_bridge var

**Date:** 2026-01-06

**Optional per env:** _required on all environments_


## CommCare Version Dependency
This change is not known to be dependent on any particular version of CommCare.


## Change Context
``rabbitmq_migration_bridge`` var is being replaced by
``celery_broker_migration``

## Details
A subtle name change to indicate that this variable is useful with more than
just RabbitMQ brokers.

## Steps to update
If you specify ``rabbitmq_migration_bridge`` in your inventory file, replace
it with ``celery_broker_migration``.
